definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: General Zhang Xueliang is a typical representative of patriotism in modern Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 張學良將軍是中國近現代史上愛國主義的典型代表。

sentences.english: In addition, he turned the justice anti-invasion war into absurdly indiscriminate rejection of everything foreign.
sentences.chinese: 把正義的反侵略的愛國主義變成了荒謬的盲目排外。

sentences.english: Peter H. L. Chang's viewpoint of national unity is an important part of his patriotism.
sentences.chinese: 張學良的國家統一思想是其愛國主義的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: They also put forward proletariate internationalism and patriotism.
sentences.chinese: 提出了無產階級的國際主義和愛國主義的觀點。

sentences.english: He is imbued with feelings of patriotism.
In matters of particle physics, then, patriotism is passé.
sentences.chinese: 愛國主義在粒子物理學領域是過去時了。

sentences.english: During the aftermath of the attack, patriotism was at gn all time high.
sentences.chinese: 在遭受攻擊後，愛國主義情緒比任何時候都高漲。

sentences.english: The “patriotic re-education, ” for example, interrupted the normal order of temples.
sentences.chinese: 例如“愛國主義再教育”擾亂了寺廟的正常秩序。

sentences.english: Hong Kong compatriots have a glorious patriotic tradition.
sentences.chinese: 香港同胞具有光榮的愛國主義傳統。

sentences.english: Often imitated or parodied , it is a familiar symbol of American patriotism.
sentences.chinese: 經常模仿或模仿，這是美國人的愛國主義熟悉的象徵。

sentences.english: Again, as in the case of patriotism, such conclusions are misguided.
sentences.chinese: 同樣地，就愛國主義來說，這樣的結論是錯誤的。

sentences.english: Some people smash the stores of our compatriots in the name of patriotism.
sentences.chinese: 有人以愛國主義的名義粉碎了我們同胞的商店。

sentences.english: Anti-Japanese Amalgamated Army songs also have the value of patriotism education.
sentences.chinese: 抗聯歌曲還具有愛國主義教育價值。

sentences.english: The article holds that national salvation is the historical theme of modern China's patriotism.
sentences.chinese: 本文認爲救亡圖存是中國近代愛國主義的歷史主題。

sentences.english: One of the major themes of the novel is patriotism.
sentences.chinese: 這部小說的主題之一是愛國主義。

sentences.english: That is the essence of patriotism.

definition: to love Hong Kong (usually implying that one also supports the PRC government)
all-round education (contrasted with 應試教育|应试教育[ying4 shi4 jiao4 yu4], exam-oriented education)
(Tw) to draw on (others' experience)/to learn from (how others do things)/lesson to be learned (by observing others)
to drag sb before a public meeting to denounce, humiliate and physically abuse them (esp. during the Cultural Revolution)
May Fourth Movement/Chinese national renewal movement that started with 4th May 1919 protest against the Treaty of Versailles
to imbue with/to inculcate/to instill into/to teach/to impart/to channel water to another place
to commit one's energy to/to devote oneself to/to sacrifice one's life for/(coll.) (of a woman) to give one's virginity to
to run in the opposite direction (idiom); to run counter to
